title: Introduction to SQL
short_description: Learn the basics of SQL with this introductory post.
body: This is the body of our first post. It covers SQL basics including SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE operations.

title: Why Coding Matters
short_description: Discussing the importance of learning to code in today's world.
body: This post explores the reasons why learning to code is more important than ever. Coding is not just for computer scientists but a valuable skill for everyone.

title: 10 Tips for Healthy Living
short_description: Simple and effective tips to improve your daily life.
body: Living a healthy life doesn't have to be complicated. Here are 10 easy tips to make your daily routine healthier.
